messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Anger Management for a 5 year old
messages.msgSnippet: Sheila Why do anything? Talking is enough. We don t necessarily need to react to our emotions. If your son is angry wouldn t it serve him especially, and his
messages.messageBody:
Sheila
Why do anything? Talking is enough. We don't necessarily need to react
to our emotions. If your son is angry wouldn't it serve him especially,
and his sister to talk with each other about their feelings and come to
some sort of compromise/solution and/or to just let each other know how
they are affecting each others lives? Then they could smile or hug and
get on with things. Michele



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
